ARN·10 | Shahrazad | Card Name
ARN·10 | Shahrazad | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Players must leave game in progress as it is and use the cards left in their libraries as decks with which to play a subgame of Magic. When subgame is over, players shuffle these cards, return them to libraries, and resume game in progress, with any loser of subgame halving his or her remaining life points, rounding down. Effects that prevent damage may not be used to counter this loss of life. The subgame has no ante; using less than forty cards may be necessary.
trans-unit.target: Players must leave game in progress as it is and use the cards left in their libraries as decks with which to play a subgame of Magic. When subgame is over, players shuffle these cards, return them to libraries, and resume game in progress, with any loser of subgame halving his or her remaining life points, rounding down. Effects that prevent damage may not be used to counter this loss of life. The subgame has no ante; using less than forty cards may be necessary.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·18 | Old Man of the Sea | Card Name
ARN·18 | Old Man of the Sea | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to gain control of a creature with power no greater than Old Man's power. If Old Man becomes untapped, you lose control of this creature; you may choose not to untap Old Man as normal. You also lose control of the creature if Old Man dies or if the creature's power becomes greater than Old Man's.
trans-unit.target: Tap to gain control of a creature with power no greater than Old Man's power. trans-unit.resname: ARN·26 | Guardian Beast | Card Name
ARN·26 | Guardian Beast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is untapped, your non-creature artifacts cannot be further enchanted, destroyed, or taken under someone else's control. If something occurs that would destroy the CARDNAME and artifacts simultaneously, the CARDNAME is destroyed but your artifacts are not. If an artifact is enchanted or stolen while CARDNAME is tapped, it remains so when CARDNAME becomes untapped.
trans-unit.target: As long as CARDNAME is untapped, your non-creature artifacts cannot be further enchanted, destroyed, or taken under someone else's control. If an artifact is enchanted or stolen while CARDNAME is tapped, it remains so when CARDNAME becomes untapped.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·31 | Oubliette | Card Name
ARN·31 | Oubliette | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Select a creature in play when CARDNAME is cast. That creature is considered out of play as long as CARDNAME is in play. Hence the creature cannot be the target of spells and cannot receive damage, use special powers, attack, or defend. All counters and enchantments on the creature remain but are also out of play. If CARDNAME is removed, creature returns to play tapped.

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME does not untap as normal; you must pay o1 during your untap phase to untap it.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·60 | City in a Bottle | Card Name
ARN·60 | City in a Bottle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All cards from Arabian Nights must be discarded from play, except for CARDNAME. While CARDNAME is in play, no further cards from Arabian Nights can be played.
trans-unit.target: All cards from Arabian Nights must be discarded from play, except for CARDNAME. While CARDNAME is in play, no further cards from Arabian Nights can be played.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·61 | Dancing Scimitar | Card Name
ARN·61 | Dancing Scimitar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
ARN·62 | Ebony Horse | Card Name
ARN·62 | Ebony Horse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: Remove one of your attacking creatures from combat. Treat this as if the creature never attacked, except that defenders assigned to block it cannot choose to block another creature.
trans-unit.target: o2: Remove one of your attacking creatures from combat. Treat this as if the creature never attacked, except that defenders assigned to block it cannot choose to block another creature.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·63 | Flying Carpet | Card Name
ARN·63 | Flying Carpet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: Gives one creature flying ability until end of turn. If that creature is destroyed before end of turn, so is CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: o2: Gives one creature flying ability until end of turn. If that creature is destroyed before end of turn, so is CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·64 | Jandor's Ring | Card Name
ARN·64 | Jandor's Ring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: Discard a card you just drew from your library, and draw another card to replace it.
trans-unit.target: o2: Discard a card you just drew from your library, and draw another card to replace it.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·65 | Jandor's Saddlebags | Card Name
ARN·65 | Jandor's Saddlebags | Card Text | Paragraph 1
ARN·66 | Jeweled Bird | Card Name
ARN·66 | Jeweled Bird | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card, and exchange CARDNAME for your contribution to the ante. Your former contribution goes to your graveyard. Remove this card from your deck before playing if you are not playing for ante.
trans-unit.target: Draw a card, and exchange CARDNAME for your contribution to the ante. Your former contribution goes to your graveyard. Remove this card from your deck before playing if you are not playing for ante.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·67 | Pyramids | Card Name
ARN·67 | Pyramids | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: Prevents a land from being destroyed, or removes an enchantment from any land.
trans-unit.target: o2: Prevents a land from being destroyed, or removes an enchantment from any land.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·68 | Ring of Ma'rûf | Card Name
ARN·68 | Ring of Ma'rûf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o5: Instead of drawing a card from the top of your library, select one of your cards from outside the game. This card can be any card you have that you're not using in your deck or that for some reason has left the game. CARDNAME is removed from the game entirely after use.
trans-unit.target: o5: Instead of drawing a card from the top of your library, select one of your cards from outside the game. This card can be any card you have that you're not using in your deck or that for some reason has left the game. CARDNAME is removed from the game entirely after use.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·69 | Sandals of Abdallah | Card Name
ARN·69 | Sandals of Abdallah | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o2: Gives one creature islandwalk ability until end of turn. If that creature is destroyed before end of turn, so are Sandals.
trans-unit.target: o2: Gives one creature islandwalk ability until end of turn. If that creature is destroyed before end of turn, so are Sandals.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·70 | Bazaar of Baghdad | Card Name
ARN·70 | Bazaar of Baghdad | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to take two cards from your library, after which you must immediately discard three from your hand to your graveyard. If you don't have three or more cards in your hand, discard your whole hand. No spells may be cast between drawing and discarding cards.
trans-unit.target: Tap to take two cards from your library, after which you must immediately discard three from your hand to your graveyard. If you don't have three or more cards in your hand, discard your whole hand. No spells may be cast between drawing and discarding cards.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·71 | City of Brass | Card Name
ARN·71 | City of Brass | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 mana of any color to your mana pool. You suffer 1 damage whenever CARDNAME becomes tapped.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 mana of any color to your mana pool. You suffer 1 damage whenever CARDNAME becomes tapped.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·72 | Desert | Card Name
ARN·72 | Desert | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or do 1 damage to an attacking creature after it deals its damage.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or do 1 damage to an attacking creature after it deals its damage.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·73 | Diamond Valley | Card Name
ARN·73 | Diamond Valley | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to sacrifice one of your creatures in exchange for a number of life points equal to its toughness. Note that this ability may be used after blocking has been declared.
trans-unit.target: Tap to sacrifice one of your creatures in exchange for a number of life points equal to its toughness. Note that this ability may be used after blocking has been declared.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·74 | Elephant Graveyard | Card Name
ARN·74 | Elephant Graveyard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or regenerate an Elephant or Mammoth.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or regenerate an Elephant or Mammoth.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·75 | Island of Wak-Wak | Card Name
ARN·75 | Island of Wak-Wak | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to reduce target flying creature's power to 0.
trans-unit.target: Tap to reduce target flying creature's power to 0.

trans-unit.resname: ARN·76 | Library of Alexandria | Card Name
ARN·76 | Library of Alexandria | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or draw a card from your library; you may use the card-drawing ability only if you have exactly seven cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: Tap to add 1 colorless mana to your mana pool or draw a card from your library; you may use the card-drawing ability only if you have exactly seven cards in your hand.
